definitions.title: n.m.pl.
definitions.body: some insignificant vine-product, usu. taken as grape-kernels, grape-stones, fr. acrid taste, so Thes (after Onk Mishn), v. also [[זׇּג]] p. 260 supr.: [[וְעַד־זׇג]] ´[[מִגֶּפֶן הַיַּיִן מֵח]] Nu 6:4 of the wine-vine, including both [[חרחנים]] and [[זג]], he shall not eat.
